general.name: macOS Base - SmartCard
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>0709101C-E4D7-4859-B760-EDC3932110DE</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Arizona Western College</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>0709101C-E4D7-4859-B760-EDC3932110DE</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>macOS Base - SmartCard</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string/><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key><true/><key>PayloadScope</key><string>System</string><key>PayloadContent</key><array><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>71411312-5D0D-47B4-BFE0-0C4815204492</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>com.apple.security.smartcard</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>DISA</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>71411312-5D0D-47B4-BFE0-0C4815204492</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>SmartCard</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string/><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>allowSmartCard</key><true/><key>enforceSmartCard</key><false/><key>UserPairing</key><true/><key>checkCertificateTrust</key><integer>1</integer><key>oneCardPerUser</key><false/></dict></array></dict></plist>
